vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.25.3;
son of: Jeduthun (H3038);
brother of: Obed-edom (H5654), Mattithiah (H4993H), Gedaliah (H1436I), Jeshaiah (H3470H) and Hashabiah (H2811I); also called Izri at 1Ch.25.11;
Also named: yits.ri (יִצְרִי "Izri" H3339)
§ Zeri = "built"
son of Jeduthun and a musician in the court of David
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jedutún; cantor del templo; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西利 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "建造"
耶杜頓的兒子, 聖殿裡的樂手 (代上 25:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西利 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "建造"
耶杜顿的儿子, 圣殿里的乐手 (代上 25:3)
